name: ai-academy-template
description: Full-stack AI Academy template with React and Flask

scripts.deploy-frontend: cd frontend && REACT_APP_API_ENDPOINT=https://api.aiacademy.com npm run build && for file in ./build/static/js/*.js; do uglifyjs
; done && aws s3 sync build/ s3://ai-academy-frontend --acl public-read
scripts.deploy-docs: cd docs && mkdocs build && aws s3 sync site/ s3://ai-academy-docs --acl public-read

author: Anote AI
